amountDecimalPlaces.description: Specifies the number of decimal places the system will display on amounts for this currency.

anyOf.description: Specifies the size of the interval to be used when rounding amounts for this currency.

displayName.description: Specifies the currency's name. This name will appear on all sales documents for the currency.

id.description: The unique ID of the currency. Non-editable.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The last datetime the currency was modified. Read-Only.

symbol.description: Specifies a graphical representation of the unit of measure.
